entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High plus 1.
